name: Maria J.
text: I love it! I make smoothies on a daily basis so this was a must-have. Easy to clean and cuts frozen fruit fast ✨❤️

name: Sierra M.
text: This blender is perfect for smoothies on the go! Convenient and fits in my bag easily!

name: Valerie P.
text: I absolutely love this blender! Strawberry smoothie came out perfect. Great consistency every time.

name: Hannah T.
text: I start work at 6am so I don't always have time to make breakfast. This was ideal to make my meal replacement shakes.

name: Brandon C.
text: It's compact and really powerful! I made a protein shake with it and it was damn good! The self-cleaning feature is a bonus.
